resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080/v1
info:
  version: "1"
  title: "demo petstore API"
paths:
  /pets:
    get:
      operationId: getPets
      x-scala-package: pet
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
    post:
      operationId: createPet
      x-scala-package: pet
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
        400:
          description: "Bad Request, response body contains error detail"
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ApiError"
components:
  schemas:
    Pet:
      type: object
      required:
      - name
      properties:
        id:
          type: number
          description: "the pet id"
          example: "1"
        name:
          type: string
          description: "the pet name"
          example: "fido"
        status:
          type: string
          example: "OK"
    ApiError:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - description
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          description: "the error code"
          example: "MT001"
        description:
          type: string
          description: "This is a human comprehensible phrase that describe the error"
          example: "missing parameter page"
